For the one hour test my midwife suggested I eat a healthy meal and then fast for 3 hours before drinking the drink. During the three hours it was okay to drink water. I wasn't given these instructions during my last pregnancy and I failed the one hour test, but passed the three hour test. This time I passed the one hour with flying colors. Trust me, you don't want to take the three hour test if at all possible. It *****. Good luck.

I had to fast from the night before my first time, but that was because I was having alot of lightheadedness, etc, so they figured I might have the gestational diabetes.  This time though I've been eating how I had to my first preg, so I'm allowed to eat before.  My diabetes was opposite most though, my body was producing too much insulin and breaking down sugar too quickly in my system, so my blood sugar was always very low instead of high.
